item.title: Uber Eats will use Starship sidewalk robots to deliver food in the UK
item.description: The two companies will start in the UK this year, before expanding to other European cities in 2026 and the U.S. in 2027.

item.title: Monarch Tractor preps for layoffs and warns employees it may ‘shut down’
item.description: The memo that went out Thursday, which TechCrunch obtained, says the "timing" of the company's pivot away from tractor manufacturing puts it at risk.

item.title: Nvidia’s record $57B revenue and upbeat forecast quiets AI bubble talk
item.description: Nvidia's earnings were dominated by its data center business.

item.title: How the classic anime ‘Ghost in the Shell’ predicted the future of cybersecurity 30 years ago
item.description: The story of Ghost in the Shell’s main villain the Puppet Master hinted at a future where governments use hackers for espionage, at a time when most o...

item.title: Cavela lands $6.6M to help brands beat pre-tariff manufacturing costs
item.description: The startup claims that its AI agents can reduce the cost of product manufacturing by an average of 35%.
